article: Hello. I'm Tom. I'm a middle school student. It's nice to meet you here. First, let me tell you  _  my family. Five people are in my  _  , my mother, my father, my two sisters and I. But I have  _  brother. My father is a worker. My mother is  _  English teacher. My sisters are sixteen. I'm fourteen. We go to the same school. We all like  watching  football games. We think they're interesting. I also have a cat.  _  name is Mimi. There is a big tree and some small trees around my house. The big one is a pear tree and the small ones are apple  _  .  _  a photo of my room. Please have a look. When you  come to  my room, you can see three English dictionaries on my desk. I like (35)  _  very much.
